pages.text: $(item)Pepper$() is a Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(item)Pepper Seeds$().$(br)Harvesting fully-grown pepper yields from 1 to 5 peppers and no seeds per crop harvested.$(br)$(item)Pepper$() can be used as an ingredient in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes like $(item)Stuffed Pepper Poppers$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.

pages.title: Pepper
pages.text: $(item)Pepper$() will naturally generate in the Savanna and the Badlands.
$(item)Pepper Seeds$() can be crafted by the $(item)Pepper$() in the Crafting Table.
